remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 控件 属性已设置或其 属性为时，才会发生此事件 `true` 。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当你希望根据单元格的值或状态确定其错误时，处理事件很有用。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 处理 事件并在处理程序中指定错误文本时，将在单元格中显示错误标志符号，除非将 属性设置为 `false` 或单元格处于编辑模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 如果检索属性的值，也会发生该事件 。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用 和 属性来确定单元的状态或值，并使用此信息来更改或修改 属性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性将用单元属性的值进行初始化，该属性的值将 重写。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理 大量数据时处理事件，以避免为多个单元格设置单元值时的性能损失 。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about
